Headline: Top New Year's Eve destinations around the world
Text: Sydney, Australia: Fireworks erupt over Sydney's iconic Harbour Bridge and Opera House. Click through the gallery for more photos of New Year's destinations around the world: Taipei, Taiwan: Fireworks explode from Taipei 101, the tallest building on the island, during New Year's Eve. Bangkok, Thailand: Thai people light candles and give prayers as they mark New Year's Eve. Dubai, United Arab Emirates: The Burj Khalifa, the world's tallest tower, serves as the staging point for a massive fireworks show. Moscow, Russia: Along with fireworks at Red Square, revelers can enjoy street performers in central Moscow.  Cape Town, South Africa: Fireworks light the sky each year at the gorgeous waterfront area. London, England: Boats line up in the Thames after watching  New Year's Eve fireworks. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil: Welcome the new year with 2 million of your closest pals at South America's party capital. New York City: Perhaps the most quintessential New Year's Eve of all is found in Times Square in Manhattan. Las Vegas: Fireworks illuminate the skyline over the Las Vegas Strip.
